bibl.title: Roman Period Mummy Masks from Deir el-Bahri. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Study of a group of linen and plaster mummy masks from Deir el-Bahri, dating to the third century A.D., with the first publication of a female mask in Dublin National Museum (Inv. 1901:79). - Pp. 141-144: Appendix. Masks from and ascribed to Deir el-Bahri.
bibl.seg: RIGGS Christina, Roman Period Mummy Masks from Deir el-Bahri. Avec résumé en anglais.
JEA 86 (2000) pp. 121-144, 2 figg. et pll. XVI-XIX, 1.
